about_the_game:
Rallycross Game

​RX Racing 2020 Pro is an arcade rallycross game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2020 in different categories. The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.

Feature :

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season

Time Attack :

Train on one of the 21 circuits for improve yourself .

Race :

There are more than 50 pilots who are divided into more than 29 teams. So choose a driver and try to lead him to victory.

Season :

- Season 2020 of NRX 15 drivers , 9 teams and 4 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 4 races

- Season 2020 of UK Rallycross 10 drivers and 5 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 4 races

- Season 2020 of RNordic 10 drivers 5 teams and 5 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 3 races

- Season 2020 of SARX 7 drivers 2 teams and 3 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 3 races

- Season 2019 of ARC 9 drivers 3 teams and 4 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 4 races

- 6 Songs

Only keyboards and mouse

This game includes :

- Fake names - Fake tracks - Fake teams - Fake cars

No licence

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 7020U CPU 2.30 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 971 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel® Display Audio , Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Only Keyboard and Mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 7020U CPU 2.30 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 971 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel® Display Audio , Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Only Keyboard and Mouse

The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.
